about: Hello! I'm Ghazi Adila Ghifari, a dedicated student with a passion for web development. Through my studies, I've acquired proficiency in various framework and ORMs, adept at both front-end and back-end development. Furthermore, my exploration of UI/UX and graphic design enhances my ability to create visually appealing and user-friendly digital solutions. Additionally, I have proficiency in using Microsoft Office applications such as Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, enhancing productivity and presentation capabilities. Complementing my technical skills are the soft skills I've cultivated through my role as a secretary. I excel in teamwork, problem-solving, and time management, attributes that contribute to my effectiveness in collaborative projects.
